Linux knowledge dump

About Linux knowledge dump:

Linux knowledge dump is, as its name suggests, a place for me to write some of the knowledge I have about the different Linux distros.

It serves a didactic purpose for anyone interested but it is mostly a ludic (A.K.A. for fun) personal project.
